title: Secure User Authentication and Multi-Factor Login
summary: Develop a secure authentication framework incorporating multi-factor login for portal access.
description: This epic involves implementing a secure user authentication system for the self-service banking portal. It will integrate multi-factor authentication (MFA) mechanisms such as OTPs, biometrics, or email-based verification. This feature ensures that user credentials and sessions are fully protected against unauthorized access. Security best practices and compliance with relevant banking regulations will be followed to safeguard all customer data at rest and in transit.

title: Responsive and Accessible User Interface
summary: Create a responsive, accessible, and user-friendly interface across devices.
description: This epic covers the design and implementation of a modern, responsive, and accessible user interface for the banking portal. It ensures consistent behavior and visual appearance across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. The focus will be on intuitive navigation, minimal clicks for task completion, and adherence to accessibility standards to accommodate all users. The design system will define reusable components to maintain uniformity across modules.

title: Personalized Dashboard and Profile Management
summary: Deliver a personalized dashboard displaying user-relevant products and services.
description: This epic builds the customer dashboard that dynamically presents financial products and bank services personalized to each user’s profile and eligibility. It will include modules for profile management, service shortcuts, and account summaries. The dashboard will provide quick visibility into user-specific data, interactive widgets, and recommendations based on eligibility rules and activity history.

title: Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
summary: Enable online account opening and service modification workflows.
description: This epic focuses on developing simplified digital workflows that allow customers to request new account openings or modify existing services. It will reduce the number of steps required to complete a request by combining guided navigation, prefilled user data, and backend validation. The workflows must comply with regulatory processes and integrate seamlessly with the banking system for automated handling of requests.

title: Save and Resume Application Functionality
summary: Implement the ability for users to save partially completed applications.
description: This epic introduces a save-and-resume feature that allows users to pause and return to incomplete applications. Saved data will be securely stored and retrievable upon user authentication, ensuring customers do not lose progress. The system will automatically sync draft status and provide clear indications for pending completion, ensuring convenience in longer or document-dependent workflows.

title: Document Upload and Validation Module
summary: Enable secure document upload, validation, and management capabilities.
description: This epic implements a document management system that allows users to securely upload, validate, and view necessary documents for account openings or service modifications. It includes input validation, encryption during transfer and storage, and compliance with banking data handling guidelines. Users can track the status of their uploaded files and manage replacements where necessary.

title: Real-Time Request Tracking and Notifications
summary: Deliver real-time updates and email notifications for user requests.
description: This epic introduces a real-time tracking system for all customer requests submitted through the portal. It will include visual indicators for progress and automatic email notifications triggered by status updates such as received, in progress, approved, or rejected. Customers will be able to view timelines and actions taken at each stage, improving transparency and engagement.

title: Comprehensive Interaction History and Audit Logs
summary: Record and display detailed user activity history for all actions.
description: This epic ensures that every interaction inside the portal is logged for visibility and compliance. It includes developing systems for storing and displaying detailed histories of requests, submissions, edits, and approvals. The history module will support search, filtering, and export of records. Audit logging will enable administrators to trace user activity for internal monitoring and investigation processes.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Integrate portal workflows with the bank’s core banking infrastructure.
description: This epic covers the development of system integration between the new portal and the bank’s existing core banking system. Secure APIs will be established for data synchronization and workflow execution, ensuring all operations—such as new account activations or service modifications—are reflected in real time. Identity verification, data validation, and error handling layers will be built into the integration architecture to maintain data integrity and reliability.

title: Independent Database and Performance Optimization
summary: Create a dedicated database layer for portal operations and performance efficiency.
description: This epic involves building an independent, high-performance database to handle user interactions, requests, and session data without impacting the core banking system’s performance. It will support secure storage, indexing for fast retrieval, and synchronization with core systems at scheduled intervals. Monitoring and optimization tools will ensure latency reduction, scalability, and overall data integrity under peak usage conditions.

title: Role-Based Access Control Implementation
summary: Enforce role-based access controls for restricted feature visibility and authorization.
description: This epic establishes the role-based access control (RBAC) framework to ensure users can only access resources appropriate to their roles and permissions. It will define user roles such as customers, administrators, and approvers, with hierarchical permissions and activity limits. This layer enhances security and regulatory compliance by restricting visibility and controlling feature access based on authorization levels.
